title: Jenelle Evans' ex-fiance Nathan Griffith 'arrested for a DUI' in North Carolina
text:
Jenelle Evans' former fiance has reportedly been arrested for a DUI in North Carolina.

Nathan Griffin, 32, was taken in by police after he was driving while impaired outside a grocery store in Cary, North Carolina on Thursday, according to Radar Online.

This comes just months after Jenelle was fired from Teen Mom 2 for the dog-killing scandal at her home. Her husband, David Eason, allegedly shot and killed her beloved dog Nugget for biting their two-year-old daughter Ensley in the face.

Booked! Jenelle Evans' former fiance has reportedly been arrested for a DUI in North Carolina. Nathan Griffin, 32, was taken in by police after he was driving while impaired outside a grocery store in Cary, North Carolina on Thursday, according to Radar Online

His ex: Together Nathan and Jenelle shared a son named Kaiser, aged five. They split in 2015

The Wake County Sheriff's Department told Radar that Griffith was arrested and then released on bond.

Together Nathan and Jenelle - who split in 2015 - share a son named Kaiser, aged five. Jenelle also has Jace, 10, with Andrew Lewis.

In July Nathan, a former Marine, said that he wanted primary custody of Kaiser after Jenelle and David had lost custody of their kids temporarily from the dog biting incident.

Her life now: Jenelle also has Jace, 10, with Andrew Lewis. And she has Ensley with husband David Eason, who has kids from another relationship as well

But then Eason was let off the hook when the Sheriff's Office and the Department of Social Service found no evidence of the dog being killed.

In July Jenelle and David regained custody of her children.

Trouble in the air: Griffith has long history with the police and has been arrested multiple times

Griffith has long history with the police.

He was handcuffed for DUI in North Myrtle Beach, North Carolina, in September 2013 for driving recklessly. He was with Jenelle at the time.

In 2014 he was caught driving with a suspended license, resisting arrest, driving on the wrong side of the road and giving a false name and address to officer.

In 2015 he was arrested for domestic violence in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.

Then in 2018 he was arrested for hitting fixtures on a freeway.

In May Evans talked being fired from Teen Mom 2.

Good daddy: Here Nathan is seen with Kaiser, the son he shares with Jenelle

'I was a little bit shocked but I saw it coming,' Evans told Us Weekly. 'It's shocking still but I respect their decision and have nothing but love for MTV.

'This is a new chapter for me and my family,' she added. 'I will continue to try what's best for me and my family.'

She also said she is working on her marriage.

'David has been here for me since the news broke, he told me to not worry about it and to stay positive,' she said. 'I'm keeping busy and staying focused on my kids and my animals and my business endeavors which have been planned for months. I'm working to fix my marriage as well and moving forward.'
description: The 32-year-old reality TV star was taken in by police after he was driving while impaired outside a grocery store in Cary, North Carolina on Thursday, according to Radar Online.
